title: Trojan - A Jamaican Story - 30CD [2001/FLAC/LOG]
description:
Trojan - A Jamaican Story

30 CD Limited Edition Boxset, courtesy of herb @ Waffles.
This torrent contains 74 high quality scans, cue files & logs
Made up from the first 10 Trojan Boxsets this Limited Edition Box Contains - 

[TRBCD001Z] Trojan Ska Box Set
[TRBCD002Z] Trojan Dub Box Set
[TRBCD003Z] Trojan Rocksteady Box Set
[TRBCD004Z] Trojan D.J. Box Set
[TRBCD005Z] Trojan Lovers Box Set
[TRBCD006Z] Trojan Tribute To Bob Marley Box Set
[TRBCD007Z] Trojan Instrumentals Box Set
[TRBCD008Z] Trojan Roots Box Set
[TRBCD009Z] Trojan Jamaican Superstars Box Set
[TRBCD010Z] Trojan Producer Series Box Set

From http://www.amazon.com/Trojan-Box-Set-Jamaican-Story/dp/B000057ZCG

Numbered Limited Edition in a Gold Embossed Box. 500 Tracks on 30 CDs with Tracks from the Greatest Names in Reggae: Lee Perry, Bob Marley, I-Roy, Desmond Dekker, Dennis Brown, Justin Hines, John Holt, Ken Boothe, Jimmy Cliff, Alton Ellis, Ethiopians, the Upsetters, King Tubby, Big Youth, Tommy Mccook, U-Roy, Gregory Isaacs, Derrick Morgan, Delroy Wilson, Dennis Alcapone, Dave Barker, Marcia Griffiths, Toots & the Maytals, Prince Far-I and Many More.
